snippet.title: Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective - Pre-Order Trailer
snippet.description:
Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective, the classic mystery game from Ace Attorney Creator Shu Takumi is being reborn on June 30, 2023! 

Pre-order now for bonus content, including four side banner backgrounds and two additional background music tracks “Missile ~ A Courageous Little Animal” and “Chicken Paradise.

Pre-order availability varies by platform.
Pre-order bonuses offered as early-purchase bonuses on some platforms.

Pre-order Now - https://bit.ly/GhostTrickOfficial

Discord: https://discord.gg/Capcom
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CapcomUSA
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CapcomUSA_
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/CapcomUSA
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/CapcomUSA/

©CAPCOM CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
